values: To flap means to move quickly up and down or from side to side.
The tiny bird flapped its wings and ate from the flowers.
n. 拍打，拍打声；神经紧张；[航] 襟翼
n. 拍打，拍打声；神经紧张；[航] 襟翼

- 轻拍
- vi. 焦急, 焦虑
- n. 片状垂悬物
- 拍打, 拍击
- 激动, 慌乱状态

flapped, flapping, flaps
